name: Drift Royale 3D
description:
The best drift battle royale is here!

Compete against 99 other vehicles to become the Royale Champion.

The walls keep getting closer as the match progresses, until one player stays alive.

Destroy other vehicles by impacting on their body... and avoid getting hit!

Super easy to control, fast fluid matches.

Statistics and level progression available.

Select your name and color and show who the drift master is!!
